title: Simple Pony
lyrics: I can I can dream away
I can't I can't wait to stay
There in my mind
Where the summer don't end
I can I can look your way
You can't you can't take your stare
I'm onto you
It's a whole wide world out there
But I just wanna stay inside
No time no time for small talk
Just dance just move in stride
I'm a simple pony
Move my tail from side to side
I feel for what you're saying
But can you just keep it quiet
These looks these looks don't lie
All I gotta do is set my mind
Just do it
I'm the colour of the candy pop
You want you shop you check me out
And it's easy as 1, 2
I'm looking right at you
